title: Got an emergency call, but it was a scam caller
content:
So today I got a call and I noticed it said "Emergency Call" on the screen along with my location. I got instantly worried that something might have happened to someone I know and I was on their emergency contact list. So I answered the phone and it was a Indian scam caller! The phone call isn't even on my latest phone calls. 

How is this even possible?? Has anyone else experienced this?
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
